desc: Audio recording of a baseball game from June 15, 2022

sttData.content: The announcer introduces the teams and explains the rules for the game.
sttData.speaker: Announcer

sttData.content: The first inning begins with both teams taking turns batting and fielding.
A series of strikes and balls occurs, leading to the first out.
sttData.speaker: Announcer

sttData.content: The second inning progresses with more action, including a home run by one team.
sttData.speaker: Announcer

sttData.content: The third inning ends with the game being tied, setting up an exciting finish.
sttData.speaker: Announcer

stt.sttSummary: This recording captures an entire baseball game featuring various action, rules, and commentary from the announcer.
